Been looking for some good Chinese food and I have to say this place is pretty good.  We got the noodles and it was very fulfilling. The egg rolls are GREAT! I haven't had egg rolls that good in forever.  And it's also affordable. Did not realize how cheap it was till I got the bill.  Only thing I didn't care for was that it was busy and so it made it harder to get the waitress attention.
Very good food !! Service was also excellent.  I would highly recommend this place to eat .  The food came fast and the people were very attentive.  Thank you BIG HENG  for a wonderful meal

The service here was good.  There is nothing to complain about the food here; my wife is a bigger fan of it than I am.

The portions were generous and the prices were about on par with any other chinese food place in Phoenix.

I recall that there's only about four dinner combo meals which are a combination of some of the same things over and over.  This is probably the only reason for me that I don't give it four stars (or go back more often).

It doesn't look impressive inside or out, but that shouldn't stop you from checking it out.

They don't deliver to us, but this has happily been our go-to place since we moved into the neighborhood!

The portion to price ratio is outstanding and the food is amazing as well.

We always get a gigantic order of the pot stickers because they are the best my household has ever had!
We love it here. Old school Chinese food and nothing pretentious. Everything we have tried is goodm Love the lo mein and sesame chicken. Prices are great too!
Amazing food and a very friendly staff. I would have to suggest there orange chicken or teriyaki chicken

My husband and I ate in the restaurant on a Saturday for dinner. It was not crowded inside but had quite a few people picking up orders to go. We got egg rolls, broccoli chicken, and emperor's chicken. Unfortunately, neither is us was happy with our food. We ended up bringing it home to our dog. The one thing that was good was the service. The food came out faster than a fast food restaurant and our server always made sure our drinks were full.

Went here for lunch and the food was very delicious and the service was great. I had the orange chicken (if u like it more spicy u should ask as it was super sweet and not spicy). It was soooooo inexpensive ($5.75 for lunch) and came with rice, an egg roll, and a cup of soup. Such a great price for good food! Loved it!!

I used to come here once every few weeks back in 2010, and loved the orange chicken lunch. Came back today after relocating from east valley, same recipe, same amazing taste. The eggdrop soup is a cure for hangovers and colds. Love that stuff! This is my favorite little spot. That staff is always friendly. It was nice to see some familiar faces from 2010. Definitely coming back.

This place is my favorite in the valley! I live around the corner for 18 years now and hands down the best food! There teriyaki chicken is the best and their egg roll are to die for!! Thank you for the many years of feeding my family kids and grandkids! You Rock!!
We went to the restaurant for lunch. Their soup was delicious but broccoli in my husband's meal taste like chemical. I will never come back to this place.

Was a little apprehensive when there were very few people there on a saturday night, but was impressed. Food was fresh and had good flavor. Whole restaurant was very clean. I have tried a lot of chinese in the valley trying to recreate the chinese i could get back east. I will definitely be back again.
Super cheap and by far the best Chinese food in Peoria or Glendale. Sketchy-ish strip mall, but totally worth it. The salt and pepper shrimp or emperors Chicken are a couple of my favorites.

My fianc√© family has been coming here ever since the moved to Arizona (18 years) & this is my favorite place to go when we are on that side of town! Tons of vegetarian options & good ones at that! Always a pleasure, always perfect whether you get take out or stay.
My favorites:
-broccoli & mushrooms 
-vegetable chop suey
-lo mien 
-I had the chicken lettuce wraps before going vegetarian, amazing w/hot mustard!
-fried rice no egg

The cashew  chicken, fried rice, sweet & sour pork and crab puffs were all amazing.  The customer service  was top notch.  I continue to search for Chinese food in the area and this has to be the best so far.
